reviews.title: Custom Xmas ornament

After 3 attempts at delivering from China it arrived. Unfortunately even though I ordered it in mid November I received it in mid January…. definitely not in time for Xmas.

reviews.title: Average quality and long wait for delivery.
reviews.body:
I ordered a T-shirt as a Christmas gift from my daughter to my wife.
The novelty factor was a success but in truth the product quality was below average for the cost. It also took a long time to be delivered. I placed the order on 8th Dec, it was dispatched on 13th but, for some reason it took until the 22nd to arrive?! Although it was ordered on a UK website, the product in made in France which you don't get to find out about until it ships. I doubt if I'll buy from here again.
reviews.product_title: This Cat Dad/Mum Belongs To - Personalised Gifts | T-shirts for Cat Lovers

reviews.title: Dog dad t-shirt
reviews.body: I was very pleased with it when it arrived, and managed to keep it secret till Xmas morning when my husband unwrapped it. I wish you could have seen his face! I pleaded not guilty and said the dog ordered it when I wasn't looking.  Anyway he wore it to Xmas dinner with the family, and said what a clever girl she was, hacking mummy's bank account to buy her dad a t-shirt. So I guess he really is pleased with it.
